plentry.pd: The display window for the video (view).
The rendering mode of the video. See .

pd.p:
The unique channel name for the AgoraRTC session in the string format. Supported characters are (89 in total):
All lowercase English letters: a to z.
All uppercase English letters: A to Z.
All numeric characters: 0 to 9.
The space character.
其他符号："!"、"#"、"$"、"%"、"&"、"("、")"、"+"、"-"、":"、";"、"<"、"="、"."、">"、"?"、"@"、"["、"]"、"^"、"_"、" {"、"}"、"|"、"~"、","。
The default value is the empty string "". If the user joins the channel through the method of the class, set this parameter to the default value. which means the user's rendering view in the channel. 此时 VideoCanvas 设置的是该用户在频道内的视图。
If the user joins the channel using the method of the class, set this parameter to the channelId of the object. The `VideoCanvas` struct defines the video canvas of the user in the channel with the specified channel ID. 此时 VideoCanvas 设置的是用户在该 channelId 对应频道内的视图。

The mirror mode of the view. See .
Clears all attributes of the local user.
If the user uses the front camera, the mirror mode is enabled by default.
If the user uses the rear camera, the mirror mode is disabled by default.
@note The SDK disables the mirror mode by default.
